column1: kenneth hanson| kenneth hanson died on saturday
column3: 2015 at his home in bruno. he was 84 years old. a memorial service will be held at 11:00 a. m. on friday
column5: 2015 at the danforth community chapel with rev. peter dobson officiating. visitation will be from 10-11 a. m. at the church. arrangements by methven funeral home.
